snippet.title: Sonic Colors Demastered - SAGE '23 Trailer
snippet.description:
New stages? Check. New skills? Check. Online leaderboards? Check.

Sonic Colors Demastered's v0.2.0 demo is now available to the public as part of SAGE '23! Over the past year both I and our incredibly talented team of composers have been working super, super hard to put this demo together. I sincerely hope you guys have fun with it and can't wait for you to experience all that it has to offer!

Link:
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-colors-demastered-sage-23-demo.1753/

Happy SAGE~
